summary:
Field Engineer with 18 years of experience in leading wellsite operations for upstream oil & gas and related industries.

I design and execute wireline operations for the complete life-cycle of a well in oil & gas exploration and production, underground storage, salt mining and the geothermal sector. I work with international and multi-cultural teams to safely, responsibly and efficiently deliver high-quality results.

During this individual project, I worked on seismic pattern recognition in 3D high-resolution seismic data in co-operation with different companies and consultants. By combining attributes with neural network algorithms, I detected and modeled the reservoir sand distribution of the Tambaredjo oil field in 3D.', 'title': 'Thesis Project - Reservoir sand distribution modeling through AI', 'employment_type': 'Internship'}]}, {'company': {'id': 1271, 'name': 'Shell', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQGN30g7aSl4NA/company-logo_400_400/0/1519856218579?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=HqIwwLBNmVKkXXiXnFVRbQwTX34PBz5TB2QZhtR3btU', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/shell/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2002}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2002}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Rijswijk / Assen, The Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2002}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2002}}, 'company': 'Shell', 'description': 'Assessment of the scope for a smart well solution in the NAM Pernis field with novel reservoir modeling software.
